item.description:
Chloe's in Hudson for our Feb Meeting.

   We can follow last years style- 2 Appetizers, Entree and Cheese plate. But other suggestions are welcome. Food cost goal is $30-$35/person(tax&tip included). Wine goal is about $25 - $40. 

   ** I need 1 or 2 volunteers to suggest and buy a wine theme **

       This is the greeting wine and 3 dinner wines.

  ** Also, someone to select cheeses from VinBin to pair with wine selection **

 

 Max of 16 people in the bar at Chloe's. The chef needs to estimate food costs/staff so we need a firm count early. Final RSVP's by Feb 16.
item.name: AWS Feb at Chloe's
